game.name: Brick Breaker Bash
game.description:
It is time to show off your ultimate arkanoid skills and tell the world that you are an awesome brick breaker! You have to use the white small and cute ball to draw a line and remove all of the bricks on the board to clear each level in Break Breaker Bash! The ball starts flying to wherever you touched. Your objective in this fun HTML5 puzzle game is to break the bricks and never let them hit the bottom otherwise you will lose. Apply your logical brain to spot the best positions and angles to hit every brick.

Your ball takes the position at a place where it touches the bottom first time after shooting. Complexities will keep increasing as you progress in this level-based breaker arcade game. Target your aim wisely so that it can hit as many bricks as possible with a single shot! Try to clear the screen with as few hits as possible to complete your game with 3 stars and highest score possible! Remember each row takes one step downward whenever a hit completes.

This addictive arcade game includes 54 unique and challenging levels to play through. Your good performance helps to earn enough coins to unlock some advanced puzzles. You will also have multiple power-ups to use to make your challenge more interesting. Use the power 1 to destroy the last row, the middle row & column can be destroyed using the power 2. You can decrease the number of bricks up to 50% with power 3 and double the number of balls using the power 4. Good luck to remove all of the bricks in all of the levels to become a brick breaker pro!

Features:

  • Free to play online
  • Various types of balls
  • 54 levels to play through
  • Easy to play, one touch-screen gameplay, designed for one handheld gameplay.
  • Power-up system
  • Buyable power-ups

How to Play:

Use your mouse to click the screen.
